36 #define FORCE_F_1_2_THRESH 0.3
37 #define FORCE_F_2_3_THRESH 0.5
38 #define FORCE_SAFETY 5
39 #define UPPER_FEED_ANGLE_THRESH 90
40 #define ROTATION_STEP 5
42 #define ARC_DOWN 1
43 #define ARC_UP 2
44 #define TRANSLATE_BACK 3
45 #define RAISE_CUP 4
46 #define LOWER_CUP 5
47 #define TRANSLATE_UP 6
48 #define TRANSLATE_DOWN 7
49 #define TRANSLATE_FRONT 8
50 #define END_EFF_FRAME "j2s7s300_end_effector"
51 #define BASE_FRAME "j2s7s300_link_base"
52 #define SENSOR_FRAME "forcesensor"
53 
54 #define MAX_STEPS 200
55 #define VEL_LIN_MAX 0.04
56 #define VEL_ANG_MAX 0.4
57 #define VEL_CMD_DURATION 0.8

60 float thresh_lin = 0.02;
61 float thresh_ang = 0.05;

85 void getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(geometry_msgs::Quaternion orientation, double& roll,double& pitch, double& yaw)
86 {
87  tf::Quaternion quat;
88  tf::quaternionMsgToTF(orientation,quat);
89  quat.normalize();
90  tf::Matrix3x3 mat(quat);
91  mat.getRPY(roll, pitch,yaw);
92 }

98 double getCurrentRoll()
99 {
100  lock_pose.lock();
101  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped temp_pose = current_pose;
102  lock_pose.unlock();
103 
104  double temp_rol, temp_pitch, temp_yaw;
105  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(temp_pose.pose.orientation, temp_rol, temp_pitch, temp_yaw);
106 
107  return temp_rol;
108 }

114 double getCurrentPitch()
115 {
116  lock_pose.lock();
117  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped temp_pose = current_pose;
118  lock_pose.unlock();
119 
120  double temp_rol, temp_pitch, temp_yaw;
121  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(temp_pose.pose.orientation, temp_rol, temp_pitch, temp_yaw);
122 
123  return temp_pitch;
124 }

130 double getCurrentRollDegrees(){
131  double temp_roll = getCurrentRoll();
132  if (temp_roll >= 0) return angles::to_degrees(getCurrentRoll());
133  return angles::to_degrees(getCurrentRoll()) + 360;
134 }
135 
140 double getCurrentPitchDegrees(){
141  double temp_pitch = getCurrentPitch();
142  if (temp_pitch>= 0) return angles::to_degrees(getCurrentPitch());
143  return angles::to_degrees(getCurrentPitch()) + 360;
144 }

149 void waitForActionCompleted()
150 {
151  std::string temp_res="";
152  while(ros::ok())
153  {
154  ros::spinOnce();
155  lock_status.lock();
156  temp_res = result;
157  lock_status.unlock();
158 
159  if (temp_res=="Stopped")
160  {
161  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Status : " << temp_res);
162  //Wait a little extra for arm to settle due to inertia.
163  ros::Time start = ros::Time::now();
164  while(ros::Time::now()-start < ros::Duration(0.2)) ros::spinOnce();
165  break;
166  }
167  }
168 }
169 
176 void setPoseForDirection(int direction, geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& start_pose,double distance)
177 {
178  geometry_msgs::Quaternion quat;
179  switch(direction)
180  {
182  case ARC_DOWN :
183  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(ROTATION_STEP),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0)); //Turn down
184  start_pose.header.frame_id=END_EFF_FRAME;
185  start_pose.pose.position.x=0;
186  start_pose.pose.position.y=0.01; // Slightly up
187  start_pose.pose.position.z=-0.01; // Slightly back
188  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
189  break;
190  case ARC_UP :
191  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(-ROTATION_STEP),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0));
192  start_pose.header.frame_id=END_EFF_FRAME;
193  start_pose.pose.position.x=0;
194  start_pose.pose.position.y=-0.01;
195  start_pose.pose.position.z=0.01;
196  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
197  break;
198  case TRANSLATE_BACK :
199  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0));
200  start_pose.header.frame_id=END_EFF_FRAME;
201  start_pose.pose.position.x=0;
202  start_pose.pose.position.y=0;
203  start_pose.pose.position.z=-distance;
204  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
205  break;
206  case TRANSLATE_FRONT :
207  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0));
208  start_pose.header.frame_id=END_EFF_FRAME;
209  start_pose.pose.position.x=0;
210  start_pose.pose.position.y=0;
211  start_pose.pose.position.z=distance;
212  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
213  break;
214 
216  }
217 }
218 
224 geometry_msgs::TwistStamped getTwistForDirection(int direction)
225 {
226  geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist;
227  twist.header.stamp=ros::Time::now();
228  twist.header.frame_id="j2s7s300_link_7";
229  switch(direction)
230  {
231  case ARC_DOWN:
232  ROS_INFO("Arc down");
233  twist.twist.linear.z=VEL_LIN_MAX;
234  twist.twist.angular.x=VEL_ANG_MAX;
235  break;
236 
237  case ARC_UP:
238  ROS_INFO("Arc up");
239  twist.twist.linear.z=-VEL_LIN_MAX;
240  twist.twist.angular.x=-VEL_ANG_MAX;
241  break;
242 
243  case TRANSLATE_BACK:
244  ROS_INFO("Translate back");
245  twist.twist.linear.x=-VEL_LIN_MAX;
246  break;
247 
248  case RAISE_CUP:
249  ROS_INFO("Raise Cup");
250  twist.twist.angular.z=-VEL_ANG_MAX; //Modded for sideways drinking
251  break;
252 
253  case LOWER_CUP:
254  ROS_INFO("Lower Cup");
255  twist.twist.angular.z=VEL_ANG_MAX; //Modded for sideways drinking
256  break;
257 
258  case TRANSLATE_UP:
259  ROS_INFO("Translate up");
260  twist.twist.linear.z=VEL_LIN_MAX;
261  break;
262 
263  case TRANSLATE_DOWN:
264  ROS_INFO("Translate down");
265  twist.twist.linear.z=-VEL_LIN_MAX;
266  break;
267 
268  }
269  return twist;
270 }

276 bool checkUpperAngleThreshold();
281 bool checkLowerAngleThreshold();
286 void fallback(bool emerg=false);

292 bool isForceSafe()
293 {
294  double local_force_f;
295  lock_force.lock();
296  local_force_f=force_f;
297  lock_force.unlock();
298 
299  if (local_force_f >= FORCE_SAFETY)
300  {
301  ROS_WARN_STREAM("PAIN THRESHOLD BREACHED!!");
302  return false;
303  }
304  else
305  return true;
306 }
307 
312 bool isAudioSafe()
313 {
314  lock_emerg.lock();
315  bool emerg = emergency;
316  lock_emerg.unlock();
317 
318  if (emerg) ROS_WARN_STREAM("AUDIO EMERGENCY DETECTED!!");
319  return !emerg;
320 }
321 
327 void publishTwistForDuration(geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist_msg, double duration)
328 {
329  ros::Time time_start = ros::Time::now();
330  while (ros::Time::now() - time_start < ros::Duration(duration))
331  {
332  ros::spinOnce();
333  cmd_vel.publish(twist_msg);
334  }
335 }
336 
342 void positionControlDriveForDirection(int direction, double distance)
343 {
344  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped start_pose, pose_in_base;
345  tf::TransformListener tf_listener;
346  //Wait for TF buffer to fill up
347  ros::Duration(0.25).sleep();
348  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
349 
350  while(ros::ok())
351  {
352  try
353  {
354  lock_pose.lock();
355  start_pose = current_pose;
356  lock_pose.unlock();
357 
358  setPoseForDirection(direction, start_pose, distance);
359 
360  tf_listener.transformPose(BASE_FRAME,start_pose,pose_in_base);
361  break;
362 
363  }
364  catch (tf::ExtrapolationException e)
365  {
366  /* ROS_INFO_STREAM("Waiting for transform "
367  //<< e.what()
368  );*/
369  }
370  ros::spinOnce();
371  loop_rate.sleep();
372  }
373 
374  cmd_pos.publish(pose_in_base);
375 }
376 
381 void driveToPitchGoalWithVelocity(int direction)
382 {
383  if(direction == RAISE_CUP)
384  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Raise Cup");
385  else if (direction == LOWER_CUP)
386  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Lower Cup");
387  else
388  {
389  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Wrong direction given!!");
390  return;
391  }
392 
393  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped start_pose, goal_pose, temp_pose;
394 
395  lock_pose.lock();
396  start_pose=current_pose;
397  lock_pose.unlock();
398 
399  double temp_rol, temp_pit, temp_yaw;
400  double goal_rol, goal_pit, goal_yaw;
401  double start_rol, start_pit, start_yaw;
402  double del_pitch;
403 
404  goal_pose = start_pose;
405 
407  tf::Quaternion q_rot = tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees( direction==RAISE_CUP?-ROTATION_STEP:ROTATION_STEP)); // Change Pitch angle
408  tf::Quaternion q_start; tf::quaternionMsgToTF(start_pose.pose.orientation, q_start);
410  tf::Quaternion q_goal = q_start*q_rot;
411 
413  tf::quaternionTFToMsg(q_goal,goal_pose.pose.orientation);
414 
415  ros::Rate loop_rate(100);
417  while(ros::ok())
418  {
419  lock_pose.lock();
420  temp_pose = current_pose;
421  lock_pose.unlock();
422 
423  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(goal_pose.pose.orientation, goal_rol, goal_pit, goal_yaw);
424  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(temp_pose.pose.orientation, temp_rol, temp_pit, temp_yaw);
425  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(start_pose.pose.orientation, start_rol, start_pit, start_yaw);
426 
427  del_pitch = goal_pit - temp_pit;
428 // ROS_INFO_STREAM("Goal_P: " << angles::to_degrees(goal_pit) << " Temp_P: " << angles::to_degrees(temp_pit) << " Del_P: " << del_pitch << " Thresh_A: " << thresh_ang);
429 
430  if (std::fabs(del_pitch)>=thresh_ang)
431  {
432 // ROS_INFO_STREAM("Publishing velocity command");
433  geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist_msg;
434  twist_msg.twist.linear.x = 0;
435  twist_msg.twist.linear.y = 0;
436  // Comment out next line ONLY if using end-effector mode ie: Mode 1 on jostick is active and 4th blue LED on far right is active.
437  twist_msg.twist.linear.z = direction == LOWER_CUP? -thresh_lin*2 : thresh_lin*2;
438  twist_msg.twist.angular.x = 0;
439  twist_msg.twist.angular.z= del_pitch>0?-VEL_ANG_MAX:VEL_ANG_MAX; //This command is for chaning Yaw, but the end effector actually changes Pitch. Weird.
440  twist_msg.twist.angular.y= 0;
441 
442  if(isForceSafe() && isAudioSafe())
443  {
444  cmd_vel.publish(twist_msg);
445  }
446  else
447  {
448  ROS_WARN("ABORTING SEQUENCE!!!");
449  fallback(true);
450  ros::shutdown();
451  }
452 
453  }
454  else
455  {
456 // ROS_INFO_STREAM("Goal reached, breaking loop");
457  break;
458  }
459 
460  ros::spinOnce();
461  loop_rate.sleep();
462  }
463 
464 }
465 
472 void moveCup(int direction, double duration=VEL_CMD_DURATION, double distance=0.1)
473 {
475  if (direction==TRANSLATE_BACK || direction==TRANSLATE_FRONT)
476  {
477  positionControlDriveForDirection(direction, distance);
478  return;
479  }
481  else
482  {
483  geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist_msg = getTwistForDirection(direction);
484  publishTwistForDuration(twist_msg, duration);
485 
486  }
487  return;
488 }

494 void poseGrabber(geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose)
495 {
496  lock_pose.lock();
497  current_pose=pose;
498  lock_pose.unlock();
499 }

505 void forceGrabber(const hri_package::Sens_Force::ConstPtr msg)
506 {
507  lock_force.lock();
508  force_f=msg->forceF;
509  force_b=msg->forceB;
510  lock_force.unlock();
511 }

521  lock_status.unlock();

527 void waitForPoseDataAvailable()
528 {
529  // This loop to wait until subscriber starts returning valid poses.
530  ros::Rate loop_rate(9);
531  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped temp_pose;
532  while(ros::ok())
533  {
534  lock_pose.lock();
535  temp_pose = current_pose;
536  lock_pose.unlock();
537 
538  ros::spinOnce();
539  loop_rate.sleep();
540 
541  if (temp_pose.pose.position.x != 0) break;
542  }
543  ROS_INFO("Pose data available");
544 }
545 
546 bool checkUpperAngleThreshold()
547 {
548  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped temp_pose;
549 
550  lock_pose.lock();
551  temp_pose=current_pose;
552  lock_pose.unlock();
553 
554  double temp_roll, temp_pitch, temp_yaw;/*
555  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(temp_pose.pose.orientation,temp_roll, temp_pitch, temp_yaw);*/
556  temp_pitch = getCurrentPitchDegrees();
557 
558 // ROS_INFO_STREAM("Checking current roll " << temp_roll <<
559 // " + " << ROTATION_STEP <<
560 // " vs limit " << UPPER_FEED_ANGLE_THRESH );
561 
562 
563  if ( temp_pitch + ROTATION_STEP >= UPPER_FEED_ANGLE_THRESH)
564  {
565  ROS_WARN_STREAM("MAX UPPER FEED ANGLE REACHED");
566  return false;
567  }
568  else
569  {
570  return true;
571  }
572 }
573 
574 bool checkLowerAngleThreshold()
575 {
576  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped temp_pose;
577 
578  lock_pose.lock();
579  temp_pose=current_pose;
580  lock_pose.unlock();
581 
582  double temp_roll, temp_pitch, temp_yaw;
583 // getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(temp_pose.pose.orientation,temp_roll, temp_pitch, temp_yaw);
584  temp_pitch = getCurrentPitchDegrees();
585 
586  if (temp_pitch - (int)angles::to_degrees(lower_angle_thresh) < ROTATION_STEP/2 )
587  {
588 // ROS_WARN_STREAM("MAX LOWER ANGLE REACHED. LIMIT: " << angles::to_degrees(lower_angle_thresh) << " CURRENT: " << temp_roll);
589  return false;
590  }
591  else
592  {
593 // ROS_INFO_STREAM("Current roll: " << (temp_roll));
594  return true;
595  }
596 }
597 
602 void callFallbackTimer(double duration)
603 {
604 
605  ros::Time start = ros::Time::now();
606  ros::Duration run_for(duration);
607  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
608  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Starting fallback timeout for: " << duration << "s.");
609  while(ros::Time::now() - start <= run_for)
610  {
611  lock_force.lock();
612  double force = force_f;
613  lock_force.unlock();
614 
615  if (force>= FORCE_F_2_3_THRESH)
616  {
617  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Force detected, breaking out of timer");
618  return;
619  }
620 
621  loop_rate.sleep();
622  ros::spinOnce();
623  }
624 
625  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Time out! Initialising fallback");
626  // moveCup(TRANSLATE_BACK);
627  fallback();
628  ros::shutdown();
629  exit(1);
630 }
631 
638 void fallback(bool emerg)
639 {
640  geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist_cmd;
641  twist_cmd.twist.linear.x = -1;
642  if (emerg)
643  {
644  twist_cmd.twist.angular.z = -1;
645  }
646  publishTwistForDuration(twist_cmd,1);
647 }
648 
653 void audioGrabber(audio_emergency::AudioMessage::ConstPtr msg)
654 {
655  lock_emerg.lock();
656  if (msg->result == "talk") emergency = true;
657  lock_emerg.unlock();
658 }

660 
661 int main(int argc, char **argv)
662 {
663  ros::init(argc, argv, "feeder_sideways_1D");
664  ros::NodeHandle nh;
665 
666  tf::TransformListener tf_listener;
667 
668  ros::Subscriber sub = nh.subscribe("/force_values", 1000, forceGrabber);
669  cmd_vel = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::TwistStamped>("/RobotControl/VelocityControl", 1000);
670  cmd_pos = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("/RobotControl/PoseControl", 1000);
671  ros::Subscriber tool_pose = nh.subscribe("/j2s7s300_driver/out/tool_pose",1000, poseGrabber );
672  ros::Subscriber control_status = nh.subscribe("/RobotControl/Status",1000, statusGrabber );
673  ros::Publisher arm_pose_pub = nh.advertise<std_msgs::Int32>("/arm_state", 1000);
674  ros::Subscriber audio_emerg = nh.subscribe("/audio_emergency",1000, audioGrabber );
675 
676  waitForPoseDataAvailable();
677 
678  double local_force_f;
679  bool print_once_only=true;
680 
682  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Initial rotation from " << angles::to_degrees(getCurrentPitch()));
683  moveCup(RAISE_CUP, VEL_CMD_DURATION);
684  ros::Duration(1.0).sleep(); // Allow inertial settlement
685  ros::spinOnce();
686 
687  lock_pose.lock();
688  initial_pose=current_pose;
689  lock_pose.unlock();
690 
692  double r,p,y;
693  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(initial_pose.pose.orientation,r,p,y);
694  lower_angle_thresh = p;
695  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Lower feed angle thresh set to " << angles::to_degrees(lower_angle_thresh));
696 
698  step_count = 0;
699  int prev_step_count = 0;
700 
701  ros::Rate loop_rate(10);
702  while(ros::ok())
703  {
704  ros::spinOnce();
705 
706  lock_force.lock();
707  local_force_f=force_f;
708  lock_force.unlock();
709 
710 
711 
712  if (local_force_f >= 0 && local_force_f <= FORCE_F_1_2_THRESH && checkLowerAngleThreshold())
713  {
714  ROS_INFO("---------------------------------------------------------------------");
715  driveToPitchGoalWithVelocity(LOWER_CUP);
716  prev_step_count = step_count--;
717  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Step : " << prev_step_count << " -> " << step_count << " @ pitch : " << angles::to_degrees(getCurrentPitch()));
718  print_once_only=true;
719  ROS_INFO("---------------------------------------------------------------------");
720  ROS_INFO(" ");
721 
722  if (prev_step_count > step_count &&
723  std::fabs((int)angles::to_degrees(getCurrentPitch()) - (int)angles::to_degrees(lower_angle_thresh)) <= ROTATION_STEP/2 )
724  {
725  callFallbackTimer(3);
726  }
727  }
728 
729  else if (local_force_f >= FORCE_F_2_3_THRESH
730  && local_force_f <= FORCE_SAFETY
731  && checkUpperAngleThreshold())
732  {
733  ROS_INFO("---------------------------------------------------------------------");
734  driveToPitchGoalWithVelocity(RAISE_CUP);
735  prev_step_count = step_count++;
736  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Step : " << prev_step_count << " -> " << step_count << " @ pitch : " << angles::to_degrees(getCurrentPitch()));
737  print_once_only=true;
738  ROS_INFO("---------------------------------------------------------------------");
739  ROS_INFO(" ");
740  }
741 
742  else if (print_once_only)
743  {
744  ROS_INFO("---------------------------------------------------------------------");
745  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Do nothing.");
746  print_once_only=false;
747  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Step : " << prev_step_count << " -> " << step_count << " @ pitch : " << angles::to_degrees(getCurrentPitch()));
748  ROS_INFO("---------------------------------------------------------------------");
749  ROS_INFO(" ");
750 
751  }
752 
753 
754  loop_rate.sleep();
755  std_msgs::Int32 arm_pose_msg;
756  arm_pose_msg.data=step_count;
757  arm_pose_pub.publish(arm_pose_msg);
758  ros::spinOnce();
759 
760  if (!isAudioSafe())
761  {
762  ROS_WARN_STREAM("ABORTING SEQUENCE!!");
763  fallback(true);
764  ros::shutdown();
765  }
766  else
767  {
768 // ROS_INFO("Audio safe");
769  }
770  }
771  return 0;
772 }
getRPYFromQuaternionMSG

Converts a quaternion message type into euler XYZ- Roll, Pitch, Yaw angles in radians.
